markdownRemark.html: TEFL is a typical language school environment with Spanish students along with a wide range of resources and facilities. You might even be offered work there or at other local academies before the course is finished. TEFL is teaching English as a Foreign Language course provider. English natives or advanced speakers graduate in 4 weeks. They offer the Trinity CertTESOL course which is validated by Trinity College London and recognised by the British Council and employers worldwide.

frontmatter.title: TEFL in Spain - Earn an Income teaching English
